metadata.description: Step right up, one and all! But be forewarned, the grisly specimens on display are not intended for the faint of heart or weak of constitution! Steel yourselves for the most astonishing, most awe-inspiring and most revolting of Mother Nature's rare mistakes! The hirsute, unkillable half-animal...WOOOOLVERINE!
metadata.name: Wolverine: The Amazing Immortal Man & Other Bloody Tales
